AjaxLoader.name: AjaxLoader
AjaxLoader.description:
Shows a loading image while page is loading, 
it handles ajax calls too.

Dashboard.name: Dashboard
Dashboard.description:
Dashboard is the welcome page of DESY where you find shared lessons and elements. 
This handles elements interaction events.

ImageEditor.name: ImageEditor
ImageEditor.description:
Image editor functions, 
crop and textarea management.

LessonEditor.name: LessonEditor
LessonEditor.description:
Lesson editor functions, 
it handles visual effects, CRUD actions on single slides and lessons, it handles tinyMCE editor too.

Times.name: Times
Times.description:
Shows a loading image while page is loading, 
it handles ajax calls too.

VirtualClassroom.name: VirtualClassroom
VirtualClassroom.description:
It's where users can share their lessons.
It handles share lessons link and add to playlist actions.

classitems.description: Bind Loader, show loader on ajaxStart and hide loader on ajaxStop.
classitems.name: bindLoader

classitems.description: Unbind Loader, unbind loader for ajaxStart and ajaxStop.
classitems.name: unbindLoader

classitems.description:
Show Loader, force loader to show.
comes with timeout (default=5000) to force loader to hide [hideLoader](../classes/hideLoader.html#method_hideLoader)
classitems.name: showLoader

classitems.description: Hide Loader, force loader to hide.
classitems.name: hideLoader

classitems.description: Reload Dashboard content on page change, using bottom pagination.
classitems.name: reloadDashboardPages

classitems.description:
Switch to suggested elements page in dashboard.

Uses: [reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination](../classes/reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination.html#method_reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination)
classitems.name: switchToSuggestedMediaElements

classitems.description:
Switch to suggested lessons page in dashboard.

Uses: [reloadMediaLessonsDashboardPagination](../classes/reloadMediaLessonsDashboardPagination.html#method_reloadMediaLessonsDashboardPagination)
classitems.name: switchToSuggestedLessons

classitems.description: Pagination html generator
classitems.name: getHtmlPagination

classitems.description:
Realod pagination html for media elements.

Uses: [changePageDashboardMediaElements](../classes/changePageDashboardMediaElements.html#method_changePageDashboardMediaElements)
classitems.name: reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination

classitems.description:
Realod pagination html for lessons.

Uses: [changePageDashboardLessons](../classes/changePageDashboardLessons.html#method_changePageDashboardLessons)
classitems.name: reloadLessonsDashboardPagination

classitems.description:
Change media elements page in dashboard.

Uses: [reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination](../classes/reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination.html#method_reloadMediaElementsDashboardPagination)
classitems.name: changePageDashboardMediaElements

classitems.description:
Change lessons page in dashboard.

Uses: [reloadLessonsDashboardPagination](../classes/reloadLessonsDashboardPagination.html#method_reloadLessonsDashboardPagination)
classitems.name: changePageDashboardLessons

classitems.description: Sets current textarea to active.
classitems.name: enlightTextarea

params.name: id
params.description: identifier for textarea to set current

classitems.description:
Disable textareas,
typically applied to all textareas,
removes the current flag to active textarea.
classitems.name: offlightTextarea

classitems.description: Get textarea coordinates while dragging
classitems.name: getDragPosition

return.description: two items array with X,Y coords in px

classitems.description: Append new textarea to image editor container
classitems.name: textAreaImageEditorContent

classitems.description: Get image relative position into editor container
classitems.name: getRelativePositionInImageEditor

classitems.description: Reset image editor functions, reset image editor to initial state
classitems.name: resetImageEditorOperationsChoice

classitems.description: Reset image editor crop, disable crop state for image
classitems.name: resetImageEditorCrop

classitems.description: Reset image editor textareas, disable text state for image
classitems.name: resetImageEditorTexts

classitems.description: Update top scrollPane when moving to another slide
classitems.name: scrollPaneUpdate

classitems.description: Hide media gallery for selected type
classitems.name: removeGalleryInLessonEditor

classitems.description: Show media gallery for selected type clicking on slide green plus button
classitems.name: showGalleryInLessonEditor

classitems.description: Restore page elements around current slide after new slide selection
classitems.name: showEverythingOutCurrentSlide

classitems.description: Hide page elements around current slide on new slide selection
classitems.name: hideEverythingOutCurrentSlide

classitems.description: Hide new slide selection
classitems.name: showNewSlideChoice

classitems.description: Hide new slide selection
classitems.name: hideNewSlideChoice

classitems.description:
Stop video and audio playing into current slide, 
usually only one kind of media is present into current slide
classitems.name: stopMediaInCurrentSlide

classitems.description:
Inizialize jQueryUI _sortable_ function on top navigation numbers,
so that they can be sorted
classitems.name: initializeSortableNavs

classitems.description: Inizialize jQueryUI _draggable_ function on slide image containers.
classitems.name: makeDraggable

classitems.description: Submit serialized form data for current slide
classitems.name: submitCurrentSlideForm

classitems.description:
Save current slide. It sends tinyMCE editor content to form data to be serialized, 
it handles form placeholders.

Uses: [submitCurrentSlideForm](../classes/submitCurrentSlideForm.html#method_submitCurrentSlideForm)
classitems.name: saveCurrentSlide

classitems.description:
Asynchronous slide loading. 
It is called when the current slide is not loaded yet.
classitems.name: loadSlideInLessonEditor

classitems.description:
Asynchronously loads current slide, previous and following if any of these aren't loaded yet.

Uses: [loadSlideInLessonEditor](../classes/loadSlideInLessonEditor.html#method_loadSlideInLessonEditor)
classitems.name: loadSlideAndAdhiacentInLessonEditor

classitems.description:
Slide to current slide, update current slide in top navigation.

Uses: [loadSlideAndAdhiacentInLessonEditor](../classes/loadSlideAndAdhiacentInLessonEditor.html#method_loadSlideAndAdhiacentInLessonEditor)
classitems.name: slideTo

classitems.description: Initialize slides position to center
classitems.name: initLessonEditorPositions

classitems.description:
TinyMCE callback to show warning when texearea content exceeds the available space.
Add a red border to the textarea

Add this function on tinyMCE setup.
classitems.name: tinyMceCallbacks

classitems.description:
TinyMCE keyDown callback to fix list item style.
It adds same style of list item text to list numbers or dots.

Add this function on tinyMCE setup.
classitems.name: tinyMceKeyDownCallbacks

classitems.description: Re-initialize slides position to center after ajax events
classitems.name: reInitializeSlidePositionsInLessonEditor

classitems.description:
Initialize tinyMCE editor for a single textarea

Uses: [tinyMceKeyDownCallbacks](../classes/tinyMceKeyDownCallbacks.html#method_tinyMceKeyDownCallbacks) 
and [tinyMceCallbacks](../classes/tinyMceCallbacks.html#method_tinyMceCallbacks)
classitems.name: initTinymce

classitems.description: Show error message when somethings goes wrong
classitems.name: slideError

classitems.description: Check if image ratio is bigger then kind ratio
classitems.name: isHorizontalMask

params.name: kind
params.description: type image into slide, acceptes values: cover, image1, image2, image3, image4

return.description: true if image ratio is bigger then kind ratio
